I booked this place the evening before our arrival and Future LPC responded right away ..welcoming us to the property and there was nothing found missing when we checked in. The place was spotless clean and having a fully equipped kitchen was so handy in making easy breakfasts and coffee/tea in the morning! When I requested an extra set of towels the response was warm and friendly and they were dropped off at our door later that day. Overall I feel this place made us feel so welcomed and my boyfriend was at the casino in 5 mins and me at the pool also in 5 mins. Stay here and have a lovely escape!

review_text:
Overall, we enjoyed our stay here! The only complaint that I have is this is NOT an â€œentire homeâ€ as listed on Airbnb. We had downstairs guests making noise during quiet hours as well as taking all of the parking spots. (These are supposed to be divided between the two units.) The hosts makes the rules of the location very clear, however, it can be hard to actually control the guests. If this location were properly listed as a two bedroom apartment I would have 0 complaints!
The rooms are tidy and free of clutter. Getting in and out was easy enough with the electronic locks. There is a staircase up to the unit, so we tried our hardest to stay quiet and not disturb the other guests downstairs. Mohegan sun is SO CLOSE and Foxwoods is only about 18 minutes away. It is a convenient location for a calm weekend getaway. We also went to mystic aquarium which is only a short drive away.
When I filter my airbnb search to be only "Entire Homes" this is not what I'm searching for.

review_text: My husband and I on a whim decided to use Airbnb for the first time and book a house close to the casinos for a little getaway. The house was immaculate and so cute! I was concerned that the bed was going to be too small since we have a king bed at home, but without two dogs sharing it, it was perfect sized for us! The instructions were clear and posted in key places to let us know all the important information we would need. We spent a lot of time at the kitchen table playing games because we lost a lot of money the first day at the casino, ha ha. I would agree with another reviewer that the couch wasnâ€™t super comfortable, but we still enjoyed watching shows in the living room. Communication was excellent as Daniel checked in with us a couple of times to make sure things were going as well as they could. the place had all the amenities you would want, and you could tell many upgrades were done. I hope any future Airbnb experiences I have go just as smoothly. Thanks Daniel!

Christina communicated quickly and professionally with a question I had and due to all of this and more, I plan to come back next year and stay in her beautiful villa! The location is perfect and you will definitely not be disappointed in this extraordinary villa!

Itâ€™s been a great trip .

Only one suggestion â€¦. A taller table and chairs on the balcony so you can see the amazing view better , the rail blocks it .

Stayed a few nights
review_text:
This was our first AirBnB experience so I have nothing to compare it to except hotels or inns. I will just give my observations and you can decide what is important to you.
The place was mostly clean and very stylish. It could use some minor repairs throughout (caulking, fix the downstairs toilet seat, fix screen sliding door on balcony). The biggest issue we had was hot water. The first night we tried to shower downstairs and bathe upstair at the same time. Big mistske, ran out of hot water in a couple minutes so we ended up with a cold shower and bath. The next night, two successful showers down (spread out by about 16 hours) but just an okay bath up. Heated water on the stove to wash hair the next morning. The next night another successful shower down and mediocre bath up. It seems like upstairs wasn't getting adequate hot water. I let the host know and he said he will look into it.
Also, could use paper towels, kleenex, dish sponges. There was a quarter of a paper towel roll there, but I wasn't sure if it was from the host or a previous guest.
Some of the coffee cups were very dirty, like they were stored without being washed properly.
The Murphy bed was comfortable and so was the upstairs bed. It was a quiet location with plenty of parking, easy access to the Norwich Inn and Spa on foot or by car. Check in and check out were simple. Host is very responsive and courteous.
Overall, a good first experience.

review_text:
This place was good for a one night stay being so close to Foxwoods. There were a couple things that I did not like about the place. We came in a fairly large sized truck, and was told there was off street parking behind the house, but we could not find any driveway behind the house even with the instructions. we ended up having to park on the narrow road. Also, when we arrived, the bathroom door did not even close, but my boyfriend was able to fix it with the tools in his truck. It also does not have a lock on the door, nor does the outlet in the bathroom work.
Besides those minor things, it was a great place to crash for a night after the casino. It had extra pillows and blankets, heat worked great for the cold night, and it had all the amenities we could have needed!

Stayed a few nights
review_text:
For just a bit more than a hotel, we found Ron's place that could accommodate my sister and niece as well and decided to go for it.
Upon check-in (which was easy) we were delighted to find that the space was clean, bright, open, and comfortable. The bedrooms were spacious with plenty of room around the beds and closet space, and the kitchen was well-stocked with anything we could need to make breakfast in the mornings and tea at night.
The in-unit washer + dryer was an awesome bonus!
The only thing to be aware of is that there is another unit downstairs and sound travels throughout the entire house. Most of the days/nights there were either quiet folks or no one staying downstairs and it was perfect, but if you have a large enough party, it's probably worth renting the downstairs too so you don't have to take your chances.

Ron was terrific communicator. The apartment was very clean, and weâ€™ll maintained, considering its age. The kitchen was nicely updated good size and well appointed . There is no living room for gathering, but the kitchen has a nice size table with benches that would accommodate 4 comfortably. We only used the back bedroom and it was a good size, and although mattress was good quality, it was way too hard for my aching bones! Bath was very small, but clean. Would have liked the room darkening shade that was on the door also in the window,
I was disappointed in Norwich and the neighborhood. In general,Norwich looks sadly economically depressed. Not much available for dining. I booked it mainly because of proximity to Mohegan Sun and and the price. If you are looking for an affordable alternative to the pricier Mohegan hotel, this is just fine for a night or two. I think my expectations were a little different from reality when I book it. My problemâ€¦ not the listing or the property.

review_text: This is the perfect getaway! We chose to book for a stay-cation and I can't wait to book again! This location is close to everything - steps from the Norwich Inn and Spa, 5 minutes from Mohegan Sun, and steps from a golf course. The property is incredibly quiet with beautiful walking paths and two clubhouses (seasonal) that offer a small gym, hot tub, two swimming pools, and more. The unit has everything you could need and more including a welcoming snacks and a binder with information on the property and surrounding area. I'm a bit of a neat-freak and this unit went above my standards. There is nothing more refreshing then walking into a pristine unit after a day at the spa. It's easy to kick back and relax in this adorable rental. Looking forward to staying again!

Condo was perfect and comfortable to just chill out in which I did both nights. The condo has 2 community areas, closest one with a big indoor hot tub, sauna, gym and seasonal outdoor pool. Both community area and Norwich Spa are a short walk from the condo location.
